AT.name: Inazuma Eleven® 3: Kettenblitz
AT.description: Mark Evans und die anderen Stars aus Inazuma Eleven sind endlich wieder da, und zwar in gleich zwei neuen Spielen der beliebten Fußball-Rollenspielserie. Inazuma Eleven 3: Kettenblitz und Inazuma Eleven 3: Explosion verlagern die Action in die großen Stadien rund um den Globus, das Ziel ist nicht weniger als der Gewinn der Frontier International Championships und der Titel als bestes Team der Welt! Es bleibt dir überlassen, für welche Version du dich entscheidest. Gehst du auf dem Feld eher "explosiv" zur Sache oder bist du eher der "Kettenblitz"-Typ? Inazuma Eleven 3: Kettenblitz und Inazuma Eleven 3: Explosion erzählen die Geschichte aus der Sicht einer jeweils anderen Hauptfigur, die ihre ganz eigenen, mächtigen Gegner zu bezwingen hat. Der Weg zu Ruhm, Ehre und dem Titel ist aber der gleiche: Es gilt, die bestmögliche Mannschaft zu rekrutieren. Das ist kein leichtes Unterfangen, denn die Teamchefs können aus über 2000 verschiedenen Charakteren wählen, denen sie im Laufe des Abenteuers begegnen. Nur wenn es ihnen gelingt, das beste und ausbalancierteste Team aufzustellen werden sie Erfolg haben – vor allem, da über 350 Spezialtechniken gemeistert werden wollen. Und alle davon haben das Potenzial, den Ausgang eines Matches dramatisch zu verändern. Es ist die einzigartige Mischung aus Rollenspiel-Elementen und sportlicher Fußball-Action, welche die Fans an der Serie so lieben. Nun gibt es zusätzlich erstmals eine echte 3D-Optik, durch die die Special Moves und Duelle noch packender in Szene gesetzt werden. Viele weitere neue Features runden das Action-Paket ab, etwa spezielle Spielzüge, die die ganze Mannschaft mit einbeziehen. Auch die Torschüsse können noch spektakulärer gestaltet werden: Die Special Moves verschiedener Team-Mitglieder sind kombinierbar und lassen richtig aufgereiht den gegnerischen Kasten erbeben.

BG.name: Inazuma Eleven® 3: Lightning Bolt
BG.description: It’s time to get into pre-season training and reacquaint yourself with Mark Evans and other star players in the Inazuma series! The action this time takes place on the global stage, with your daunting objective to win the Frontier International Championships, and be crowned the greatest team in the world! It's up to you which version you choose - are you more of a Bomb Blast or a Lightning Bolt on the pitch? In the pursuit of glory, you'll need to create a formidable and unique line-up, with Inazuma Eleven 3 containing over 2,000 characters to encounter and recruit. Only by creating the strongest and most balanced team will you experience success, especially when there are also over 350 in-game special moves to consider, which have the potential to dramatically alter the course of a match. In terms of the storyline, both Inazuma Eleven 3: Lightning Bolt and Inazuma Eleven 3: Bomb Blast adopt the point of view of a different character, each version having different powerful rivals to take on. Bringing back the unique formula of RPG elements combined with football-based action, this time around you can get further immersed in the game with the series debuting in 3D, making the special moves and “battle scenes” even more intense. New features on the pitch include the ability to roll out special tactical team plays which involve the whole team, as well as a goal shoot chaining system where you can string together special moves from different teammates to launch powerful attacks on goal.

BE.name: Inazuma Eleven® 3: Foudre céleste
BE.description: Débutez l’entraînement de pré-saison et retrouvez Mark Evans et les autres joueurs vedettes de la célèbre série Inazuma ! L’action se déroule cette fois à échelle internationale, votre but colossal étant de remporter les Frontier International Championships et d’être couronné « plus grande équipe du monde entier » ! Et c'est à vous que revient le choix de la version à laquelle vous souhaitez jouer : êtes-vous plutôt Feu Explosif ou plutôt Foudre Céleste ? Pour décrocher la gloire, vous pourrez constituer une formation aussi formidable qu’exclusive en piochant dans les quelques 2000 personnages présents dans Inazuma Eleven 3. Ainsi, c’est en créant la plus redoutable et la plus réfléchie des équipes que vous goûterez au succès, et tout particulièrement lorsque vous utiliserez plus de 350 capacités spéciales, chacune pouvant altérer considérablement le déroulement des matches. En terme de scénario, autant Inazuma Eleven 3: Foudre Céleste que Inazuma Eleven 3: Feu Explosif permettent d’incarner un personnage différent, et chaque épopée propose son lot d’adversaires puissants à défier. Fidèles au savant mélange alliant éléments de RPG à une action 100% football, ces deux jeux vous proposent de vibrer comme jamais grâce à l’implémentation de la 3D. Grande nouveauté dans cette série, la 3D sublimera l’intensité des capacités spéciales et celle des « séquences de combat ». Au nombre des nouvelles capacités à découvrir sur le terrain, lancez des actions tactiques spéciales regroupant toute votre équipe, et un système d’offensive enchaînant les pouvoirs des différents joueurs pour une attaque dévastatrice.

Bringing back the unique formula of RPG elements combined with football-based action, this time around you can get further immersed in the game with the series debuting in 3D, making the special moves and “battle scenes” even more intense. New features on the pitch include the ability to roll out special tactical team plays which involve the whole team, as well as a goal shoot chaining system where you can string together special moves from different teammates to launch powerful attacks on goal.

NO.name: Inazuma Eleven® 3: Lightning Bolt
NO.description: It’s time to get into pre-season training and reacquaint yourself with Mark Evans and other star players in the Inazuma series! The action this time takes place on the global stage, with your daunting objective to win the Frontier International Championships, and be crowned the greatest team in the world! It's up to you which version you choose - are you more of a Bomb Blast or a Lightning Bolt on the pitch? In the pursuit of glory, you'll need to create a formidable and unique line-up, with Inazuma Eleven 3 containing over 2,000 characters to encounter and recruit. Only by creating the strongest and most balanced team will you experience success, especially when there are also over 350 in-game special moves to consider, which have the potential to dramatically alter the course of a match. In terms of the storyline, both Inazuma Eleven 3: Lightning Bolt and Inazuma Eleven 3: Bomb Blast adopt the point of view of a different character, each version having different powerful rivals to take on. Bringing back the unique formula of RPG elements combined with football-based action, this time around you can get further immersed in the game with the series debuting in 3D, making the special moves and “battle scenes” even more intense. New features on the pitch include the ability to roll out special tactical team plays which involve the whole team, as well as a goal shoot chaining system where you can string together special moves from different teammates to launch powerful attacks on goal.

NL.name: Inazuma Eleven® 3: Lightning Bolt
NL.description: Mark Evans en zijn team van supervoetballers komen terug met nieuwe delen in de Inazuma-serie! In deze twee nieuwe versies van de populaire voetbal-RPG wordt wereldwijd gestreden om de cup van de Frontier International Championships. Lukt het Mark Evans een team te vormen dat sterk genoeg is om wereldkampioen te worden? Kies zelf je versie; ben je meer explosief of meer een bliksemschicht op het veld? In Inazuma Eleven 3 kunnen spelers maar liefst 2.000 personages leren kennen en voor hun team gebruiken. Alleen een sterk en evenwichtig team kan wedstrijden winnen. Daarvoor is het ook de kunst om slim gebruik te maken van meer dan 350 speciale acties die grote impact kunnen hebben op het wedstrijdverloop. Het verhaal wordt in Inazuma Eleven 3: Lightning Bolt en Inazuma Eleven 3: Bomb Blast vanuit verschillende perspectieven verteld, terwijl de twee versies de spelers ook tegen verschillende rivalen laten strijden. De basis van beide spellen wordt gevormd door een unieke mix van RPG-elementen en voetbalactie. Mede doordat het hele spel nu in 3D wordt gepresenteerd, kunnen spelers genieten van extra spektakel tijdens speciale acties en “gevechtsscènes”. Er zijn ook nieuwe spelmogelijkheden, zoals de optie om tactische beslissingen te maken voor het hele team, en de mogelijkheid om speciale acties van verschillende teamleden te koppelen, zodat de bal met extra kracht richting het doel van de tegenstander wordt geschoten.

PL.name: Inazuma Eleven® 3: Lightning Bolt
PL.description: It’s time to get into pre-season training and reacquaint yourself with Mark Evans and other star players in the Inazuma series! The action this time takes place on the global stage, with your daunting objective to win the Frontier International Championships, and be crowned the greatest team in the world! It's up to you which version you choose - are you more of a Bomb Blast or a Lightning Bolt on the pitch? In the pursuit of glory, you'll need to create a formidable and unique line-up, with Inazuma Eleven 3 containing over 2,000 characters to encounter and recruit. Only by creating the strongest and most balanced team will you experience success, especially when there are also over 350 in-game special moves to consider, which have the potential to dramatically alter the course of a match. In terms of the storyline, both Inazuma Eleven 3: Lightning Bolt and Inazuma Eleven 3: Bomb Blast adopt the point of view of a different character, each version having different powerful rivals to take on. Bringing back the unique formula of RPG elements combined with football-based action, this time around you can get further immersed in the game with the series debuting in 3D, making the special moves and “battle scenes” even more intense. New features on the pitch include the ability to roll out special tactical team plays which involve the whole team, as well as a goal shoot chaining system where you can string together special moves from different teammates to launch powerful attacks on goal.

PT.name: Inazuma Eleven® 3: Lightning Bolt
PT.description: Está na hora de voltar aos treinos com Mark Evans e com os outros jogadores que conheces da série Inazuma! Nestas novas versões do popular jogo que cruza o desporto-rei com elementos de aventura, o objetivo será vencer os Frontier International Championships e ser campeão com a melhor equipa do mundo! Tu escolhes a versão que preferes: Bomb Blast ou Lightning Bolt! Para conquistares este título, terás de reunir uma equipa formidável a partir das mais de 2000 personagens incluídas em Inazuma Eleven 3. O sucesso só estará garantido para aqueles que criarem uma equipa forte e equilibrada, especialmente se atendermos aos mais de 350 truques especiais existentes no jogo que podem mudar drasticamente o curso de uma partida. No que diz respeito à história, tanto Inazuma Eleven 3: Lightning Bolt como Inazuma Eleven 3: Bomb Blast adotam a perspetiva de uma personagem diferente, sendo que cada versão oferece também adversários diferentes para enfrentar. Combinando elementos de RPG com futebol, desta vez sentir-te-ás ainda mais imerso na ação graças à estreia da série em 3D, que faz com que os truques especiais e as sequências animadas pareçam mais intensos do que nunca. Das novidades em campo fazem parte a capacidade de executar jogadas táticas especiais que envolvem toda a equipa, assim como a possibilidade de encadear truques de diferentes colegas de equipa para, assim, desferir poderosos remates à baliza adversária.

RU.name: Inazuma Eleven® 3: Lightning Bolt
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. Пора начать предсезонную подготовку и вновь встретиться с Mark Evans и другими звездными игроками серии игр Inazuma! Соревнования выходят на мировой уровень. Перед вами стоит амбициозная цель — победить на чемпионате Frontier International и стать сильнейшей командой мира! Выбор версии игры за вами! На поле вам ближе взрывной характер — Bomb Blast — или энергия молнии — Lightning Bolt? На пути к славе вы сможете создать уникальную команду, выбирая игроков из более чем 2000 персонажей. Игроки владеют более чем 350 специальными приемами, способными резко изменить ход матча, и только сильнейшая и идеально сбалансированная команда приведет вас к успеху. Сюжет в Inazuma Eleven 3: Lightning Bolt и Inazuma Eleven 3: Bomb Blast раскрывается с точки зрения разных персонажей, и каждому предстоит одолеть своих сильных соперников. Уникальная формула, соединяющая элементы ролевой игры с футболом, возвращается. На этот раз погружение в атмосферу игры будет еще глубже — ведь серия дебютирует в 3D, а значит, специальные приемы и сцены боя становятся еще красочнее. К футбольным новшествам относятся специальные тактические схемы для всей команды, а также цепная система ударов по воротам. Теперь вы можете проводить на ворота соперника мощные атаки, комбинируя специальные приемы нескольких товарищей по команде.

movies.name: Inazuma Eleven® 3: трейлер, посвященный выходу игры
